description: Housed in a beautiful early-20C residence with a panoramic terrace overlooking the hamlet of San Donato in Poggio, this restaurant comprises a dining room and a winter garden to the rear of the building. Tuscan classics take pride of place on the menu, which features a selection of familiar and popular dishes. Four guestrooms are available for anyone looking to extend their stay.
facilitiesServices: Garden or park, Interesting wine list, Terrace
